name: Slack Notification for Form Submissions
description: Get instant Slack notifications when someone submits a contact form on your website. Perfect for sales teams who need immediate lead alerts.
basePrompt: Send a Slack message to #leads channel when a new contact form is submitted on my website with the person's name, email, and message

name: Gmail to Google Drive Backup
description: Automatically save Gmail attachments to Google Drive and organize them by date. Never lose important files again.
basePrompt: Save Gmail attachments to Google Drive in a folder organized by date and sender, then mark the email as processed

name: Social Media Cross-Posting
description: Post your content across Twitter, LinkedIn, and Facebook simultaneously. Save time on social media management.
basePrompt: When I publish a new blog post, automatically share it on Twitter with hashtags, LinkedIn with professional formatting, and Facebook with engaging text

name: GitHub Issue to Discord
description: Keep your development team informed by sending Discord notifications for new GitHub issues and pull requests.
basePrompt: Send a Discord message to #dev-alerts channel when a new GitHub issue is created or when a pull request is opened, including issue details and labels

name: Calendar Event from Trello Cards
description: Automatically create Google Calendar events when Trello cards are moved to specific lists with due dates.
basePrompt: When a Trello card is moved to 'In Progress' list and has a due date, create a Google Calendar event with the card name and description

name: Twitter Mentions to Spreadsheet
description: Track brand mentions by automatically saving Twitter mentions and replies to a Google Sheets spreadsheet for analysis.
basePrompt: Save all Twitter mentions of my brand username to a Google Sheets spreadsheet with tweet content, author, date, and engagement metrics

name: Customer Support Ticket Routing
description: Automatically route support tickets to the right team members based on priority level and category.
basePrompt: When a support ticket is created in Zendesk, analyze the priority and category, then assign it to the appropriate team member and send them a Slack notification

name: E-commerce Order Processing
description: Streamline order fulfillment by automatically creating shipment labels and sending customer notifications.
basePrompt: When a new order is placed in Shopify, create a shipping label, update inventory, and send a confirmation email to the customer with tracking information

name: Lead Scoring and CRM Update
description: Automatically score leads based on their actions and update your CRM with enriched contact information.
basePrompt: When someone downloads a whitepaper from my website, score them based on their company size and role, then add them to my CRM with enriched data from Clearbit

name: Code Deployment Notifications
description: Keep stakeholders informed about deployments with automated notifications across multiple channels.
basePrompt: When code is deployed to production via GitHub Actions, send notifications to Slack with deployment details and send an email summary to stakeholders

name: Invoice Generation and Tracking
description: Automatically generate invoices when projects are completed and track payment status across systems.
basePrompt: When a project is marked as complete in Asana, generate an invoice in QuickBooks, email it to the client, and create a follow-up reminder in 30 days

name: Content Publishing Pipeline
description: Streamline content publishing by automatically formatting and distributing content across multiple platforms.
basePrompt: When a blog post is published in WordPress, automatically create social media posts with appropriate formatting for Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram, then schedule them for optimal times
